item.title: Ben Blackburne
item.description:
I work for Papers ReadCube doing Cocoa development and data science with a side of node.js. In a previous existence I was a bioinformatician.

Selected Publications

Class of multiple sequence alignment algorithm affects genomic analysis Molecular Biology and Evolution http://doi.org/10.1093/molbev/mss256

Measuring the distance between multiple sequence alignments Bioinformatics http://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btr701.

Mutation spectrum revealed by breakpoint sequencing of human germline CNVs
Nature Genetics http://doi.org/10.1038/ng.564.

Changing Selective Pressure during Antigenic Changes in Human Influenza H3
PLoS Pathogens http://doi.org/10.1371/journal.ppat.1000058.

Three Dimensional Functional Model Proteins: Structure, Function and Evolution
Journal of Chemical Physics http://doi.org/10.1063/1.1590310.

A fuller publication list is available.

Contact

Twitter: bpb
Email: bpb@nulllysozyme.net

item.title: Publications
item.description:

Book Chapter
